name: tis-the-season-website
description: Main site for Tis the Season

scripts.css:prod: node-sass src/scss/main.scss --output-style compressed | postcss -u autoprefixer -b '> 5%' > dist/css/app.css
scripts.mkdirs: mkdir -p dist/js && mkdir -p dist/css && mkdir -p dist/images && mkdir -p dist/images/icons
scripts.assets: npm run imagemin && npm run icons
scripts.prebuild:dev: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run imagemin && npm run icons
scripts.build:dev: npm run css:dev && npm run js:dev
scripts.prebuild:prod: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run imagemin && npm run icons
scripts.build:prod: npm run css:prod && npm run js:prod

author: Stetson Ramey
